content.rendered:
Formula One

Description

Formula One also known as F1 is a retro racing game developed by Lankhor in 1993 for Sega. You are a participant of F1 race and you need to take the 1st place. Pick your desired F1 car from McLaren to Lotus and try your luck. You can find tracks from around the world but in game it’s only track and green grass around it.

Features

  • You can change the quality of graphics, difficulty of gameplay and transmission from automatic to manual.
  • Three available modes: arcade, training and championship.

Developer

Formula One is developed by Lankhor and published by Domark in 1993.

Gameplay
